website_summaries.verdict: Though technically sold as a pillow protector, this heavy-duty product is a bedtime must-have for customers with severe allergies.
pros: Completely hypoallergenic and waterproof while offering full protection against bed bugs
Customers rave over their simple cleaning instructions
cons: Pillow protector sizing can be larger than the standard pillow, which may cause problems for those with sensitive allergies

customer_reviews.title: If i could return I would
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't breath at all. It literally creates a pocket of air around the pillow you have to deal with everytime you lay down. Super annoying and if I could return for a refund I would. 'smooth' cotton feel is also a major overstated since its a smooth but course feeling material. Oh well, money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Tuffie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: I would rather be allergic to my old pillows than to sleep on this cover! A horrible Chemical smell even after washing. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Nutragirl

customer_reviews.title: Total fail
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a feather pillow. Within a week a feather from inside the pillow was pushing out their the seam of the encasement. If this encasement couldn’t keep in a feather from a pillow i had NO confidence it could contain a bed bug 1/3 the size of a feather! I threw them out and bought different encasements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Using these on my toddlers bed. Every day his pillow is damp. I got these so I wouldn’t have to wash the pillow every day. I’m still washing it every day. The pillow is just as wet as the pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use the pillow covers. They absorb air and it's like sleeping on a balloon. I've even tried to squeeze out the air and quickly zip it shut but it still adds air. My pillows are foam..does this affect the performance of the covers? Is it possible to return them at this time? I just tried to use them a few days ago for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Martini65

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcase ripped at first wash
customer_reviews.text: One of the two pillowcases ripped at the first wash before use. The quality for the price seemed cheap and the pillow cases sounded crinkly when on the pillow. I was surprised by the quality based on the stars this product has received. I will be looking for a better product to replace this one, I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Theresa L. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and were soft, but they were ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and were soft, but they were absolutely not waterproof. Sweatproof, perhaps. But waterproof, no. The pillow was completely soaked when there was an "accident", which is what we'd bought the pillowcases for in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazinggggg!!!
customer_reviews.text: Feels amazing!!! It's a towel texture and it feels so good to put your face directly on it. No need for extra pillow case. It zips tightly and inside is like plasticky material so I'm sure that bug can't get through it. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: TU

customer_reviews.title: 100 % waterproof SureGuard Pillow Protectors
customer_reviews.text: These pillow protectors fit my queen pillows well. The protectors do not seem to bother me sleeping on them even though they have a "waterproof barrier". Any plastic or other material that would be used on some products might cause a person to perspire and be uncomfortable. Down pillows are difficult to clean so some protection for them is necessary. The protectors are easy to wash and have not presented any problem. Hang to dry - do not use a dryer for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Provides protection but retains heat.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered similar pillow protectors from a different manufacturer and have been pleased with them for the past 3 years. But I needed queen size for our new goose down pillows and the other mfg didn't carry that size. We did use the pillows a few nights, without the protector and had no problems. I also washed the protectors before putting the pillows in them. Typically, I'm always cold, especially in the winter. So when the first night we slept with the pillow protectors on and it caused us to feel over heated and sweat, we knew they were not going to work out for us. Not sure if they can be returned if I already washed them.
customer_reviews.author: Mixdplate

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted
customer_reviews.text: These are way over priced for what you get. I washed them before putting them on our pillows. They washed up nicely, however the zipper sucks. Big time. And in the middle of the night we removed them because they make us sweat. I feel we wasted our money on these. And returning is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Limited.Edition

customer_reviews.title: SLEEP WITHOUT QUILLS STICKING YOU
customer_reviews.text: I love my goose down pillows but the quills scratched my face and stuck me in the neck. I put these pillow protectors on my two pillows and not ONE stick since. I love them. They're soft to the touch and easy to clean. I do recommend that when you wash them do not put them in the dryer. Let them dry naturally. I would recommend these to my mother. Now I get the really good night sleep of a real down pillow and the peace of a cheap foam pillow. They also keep bugs out of nesting in your pillows so this is another plus. Enjoy! No dust mites ever again!
customer_reviews.author: SimMoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of pillow protectors!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and barely noticeable set of pillow protectors. Previously, I've purchased other brand and they were not breathable; however, they must had been waterproof because it made my pillows extra firm and I had to return them due to discomfort. So, I was a bit skeptical about this brand but decided to give it a shot and do not regret! I don't know just yet if they are really waterproof but quality seems nice and soft and I am sure it has some level of protection at least. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is not suitable.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would solve the issue with those rare occurrences of nighttime perspiration that sometimes happens post menopause. And they ARE BUT the zipper is not strong. I suspected the zipper would malfunction but I thought I would get more than 1-1⁄2 months use. DO NOT BUY BECAUSE THE ZIPPER WILL MALFUNCTION. This is an update: Even though slightly past the return period, I called Amazon and they refunded this purchase completely. I love Amazon but not these pillow protectors.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Too Early To tell
customer_reviews.text: Just had these pillow protectors just about 2 weeks. They seem well made and time will tell how they protect the pillows. Did find they are a snug fit on the Martha Steward pillows that have a "cool" surface treatment as I believe there is some memory foam inside. Just can't remember the model type. In addition the pillow covers just fit these pillows and since the inner liner of the covers is a treated material it tends to hold air inside so we had to unzip the encasement zipper a bit to let air out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: About 8 years ago I purchased a similar product for our queen size pillows from a mattress store. Recently, I discovered my husband's pillow cover was deteriorating on the inside. I went back to the store only to find that they no longer sell them so I started looking on Amazon. I received the SureGuard pillow covers about 2 weeks ago and they fit perfectly and appear to be great covers. If they perform for 8 years before I have problems, I will be a very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than a standard/queen
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect my boys pillows. They seem a lot thinner than I would expect out of a quality terry cloth, the zipper only goes a little over 1/2 way across making stuffing your pillow in a chore, and they are a bit bigger than a standard/queen. If these were for my husband and myself I would have sent them back, as it stands I will NOT be reordering these when the current ones blow out. Also, they are so wet when washed it takes forever for them to dry! I. H.A.T.E. T. H. E. S. E.
customer_reviews.author: amber smith

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Read a ton of reviews before buying and was super nervous about the pillow cases being blown up and puffy since I like my pillows like a soft sack of potatoes. They have to be malleable and lumpy. Anyway they do blow up but I put a pillowcase over it and squeezed really tight. After one time of doing that each time I change the pillow as, it doesn’t fill back up. I don’t open and close the zipper much based on what people said, and haven’t had problems. I kind of tuck the zipper in and make sure it’s pulled all the way. Alsooo I washed and dried it without problems 😁 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Habes

customer_reviews.title: Good feel, havent had long
customer_reviews.text: Seems good, I have not had them long enough to speak to durability and I have not tried to clean them as they have hardly been used. I will say that I like the terry cloth facing, I also have the mattress covers, so far I really like them for my rental. They are not plastic-sweaty feeling, and seem comfortable. I do have an additional general mattress cover over the mattress, and the shams do cover the euro cover. So far I am very pleased with the feel of them!!
customer_reviews.author: DRnSD

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where have these been all my life?! I can't say enough good things about these pillows... they are just what I've always wanted and needed! For us, they were too stuffed, so we removed enough of the filling to make two extra pillows. They are perfect for both side and back sleepers, as you can move the stuffing around to accommodate whatever position you're in. I HIGHLY recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: ineedadayoff

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection for Down Pillows
customer_reviews.text: These are a good way to protect down pillows and are sturdy enough to keep any stray feather quills from poking out. So far they've held up well and launder easily. Make sure they are completely dry before using - inside and out. Also, remember to release excess air before completely sealing for the best night's sleep. They will release air on their own but it's slow and could result in a stiff neck if you are sensitive that way.
customer_reviews.author: KellyBee

customer_reviews.title: I like these very much
customer_reviews.text: I like these very much. When I was looking for pillow protectors, I saw many that were lower in cost. in fact this one was the most expensive of all the ones I looked at. Sure, the extra features are great but that's not what I based my decision on primarily. The pillows are a bit odd-sized and I was looking for measurements. None of the others I looked at had measurements in their descriptions. I'm thankful that this seller took the time to provide that information. Saying "queen size" is not enough. I've seen queen bedding come in all kinds of different sizes, especially pillowcases and protectors. Thank you for a great product and excellent customer care.
customer_reviews.author: SpiceIslander

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO EXPENSIVE. PURCHASE THE ALLEREASE ONES
customer_reviews.text: As a product, these are just fine. I've purchased 6 sets of 2. The problem: they are WAY TOO EXPENSIVE. I've ordered the much cheaper AllerEase ones and they are just as good for much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Really Like These
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because hubby's head makes pillow smelly; put these on new pillows, which still smell new; when I change the bed linens every 2 weeks I also change these protectors; no need to bleach, which manufacturer advises against; I add white vinegar to wash cycle to neutralize odors; there is no sound or crinkle, etc. from these protectors; they are soft and become invisible; have not had them long enough to know how long they will survive being laundered monthly (due to every 2 wk rotation), but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: The pro's and con's make it average.
customer_reviews.text: It's very difficult to find quality bed pillow covers. These are somewhat better constructed, but the material is odd for sleeping and it has a peculiar (unpleasant) odor that hopefully after several washings will dissipate. There is a "terry" outside, but it's thin and not absorbent enough. I did think, unlike other reviewers, the zippers were set satisfactorily, which is the only plus.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fargo

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: They are horrible! It's like sleeping on top of an air balloon! It is essentially a heavy plastic with a tight zip it keeps all the air in the pillow. I cannot use and cannot return very expensive and very disappointing! The have a nice cotton finish but the interior side is plastic so when you put your head on it its like a big bubble of air. I was so hopeful these would work as my fiance has terrible allergies. They look great but they do not function. I even tried unzipping a little to let the air escape but to no-avail it still didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Martine

customer_reviews.title: Air Pillows
customer_reviews.text: The mattress encasement is a little big but that is only a visual annoyance to me, once I put a sheet over it I don't think about it again. The pillow encasements seem to hold air and I find myself unzipping them frequently to force the air out or its like sleeping on a balloon. Because my lil one needs them I'm not going to sweat the small stuff. Her allergist recommended them so that is what we will buy. What ever is in her best interest.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feathers where they belong!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my sofa cushions. These cushions are stuffed with feathers and the feathers had quills that constantly stuck us when we were sitting on the sofa. Not only did we get stuck but feathers would escape from the pillows and we would have feathers all over the house. What a pleasure for this problem to end! No more feathers everywhere and no more quills sticking us!
customer_reviews.author: silvana

customer_reviews.title: Must have for families with young kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are the best waterproof pillow protector I've gotten yet. I have LOTS of small kids, when stomach viruses hit, they make the rounds and while I had plenty of cases, I quickly realized that unless the pillow was waterproofed, most likely it was a goner (too expensive!). I love that these came in sets of 2... I bought a set for each child, one for on the pillow and one spare. We made it through our last tummy bug with no ruined pillows! These are easy to clean and dry, I've had no trouble with the zippers, and they make NO noise what all.
customer_reviews.author: WhidbeyMom

customer_reviews.title: Are you buying for kids? Then skip these.
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying just for allergy and sweat protection, these are probably fine. But if they're for a bed with young children, they ARE NOT even leak resistant.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: If you like the feel of your down pillow, don't choose these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a new pair of king sized down pillows. I'm sure they are very protective, but we found them too heavy for the pillows. The inside shell feels "plastic-y." The outside cover is heavy terrycloth. The combination of these materials acts as a barrier and holds air inside the pillow. It takes away from the softness of the down. Unfortunately, we did not have our bedroom furniture delivered in time to find this out until the return time passed, and are now unable to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Wilde1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, I had bought cheaper ones elsewhere and the zipper popped, threw them out. Brought these and they are excellent. Overpriced but excellent. You will buy them once and not every 3 years like the cheaper ones. Thick terry fabric with a waterproof backing, strong zipper, well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: KSwan

customer_reviews.title: Protection vs. Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These protectors get a 5 star for protection. They are soft on the outside and tough on the inside. In fact too tough that it cause air to get trapped in and when you use your pillows it feels like your head is resting on a rubber ball. For me that is too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyHair

customer_reviews.title: Very love the pillow protec
customer_reviews.text: The SureGuard Pillow Protectors are well made and are large enough to make putting them on the pillows very easy. I have not washed these yet, but I have washed and dried the SureGuard Mattress protector several times and it was easy to do and it came out perfectly. Also easy to fold. There was no damage to the waterproof layer which had happened to other brands of waterproof mattress protectors we had purchased. I am sure the pillow protectors we wash just as successfully. I highly recommend the SureGuard brand.
customer_reviews.author: silvermoon

customer_reviews.title: Helps allergies
customer_reviews.text: These pillow protectors seem to be allergen free. I washed them first and then dried in dryer with zippers open on low heat. No smell and they fit pillows with plenty of room. Just put a pillow case over the pillow protector because you don’t want to constantly wash the pillow protector.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I see what people mean about the air bubble but it’s not really bothersome. Since I’m using these to protect pillows that aren’t washable rather than for bed bugs I just leave a tiny corner unzipped and the air isn’t an issue. Most importantly it doesn’t feel strange under my actual pillow case
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pillow Protectors
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I thought they would be. I bought them for my grandson's pillows. Unfortunately, my timing was off. My daughter lives in another city. Between the order date and her two-week vacation, I missed the Return Windo. She decided not to use them. Now I'm stuck with several unopened packages that I cannot return. I've contacted the company to see if they would make an exception to enable a Return.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Girl

customer_reviews.title: Zipper does not function properly
customer_reviews.text: This pillow cover has been a pain to zip from day 1. The zipper is of poor quality and always gets jammed. The zipper eventually jammed so bad that when I tried to zip it closed the pillowcase ripped and is no longer usable. I really don't understand all the good reviews, I would not recommend this at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jacinta Mae

customer_reviews.title: Are they easy to put on and remove
customer_reviews.text: How well do they fit on your pillows? - they fit perfectly! Are they easy to put on and remove? - very easy to put on and pull off pillows Any recent spills or stains they protected against? -my cat threw up on my pillows, sureguard protected my pillows 100% and I just had to wash the cover and the sure guard protector How simple are they to wash and dry?- super easy Have they helped with your allergies in any way? - I do feel that it's helped with my allergies Would you recommend them - would DEFINITELY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: SureGuard Pillow Protectors. Like the way these fit. Just enough room in them to not be loose, but more like the actual pillow itself. Also not that typical tightness many covers or cases have where you're fighting to cram the pillow in AND it won't go while maintaining its natural shape. Overall, happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pillow Protectors
customer_reviews.text: The SureGuard Pillow Protectors are wonderful pillow protectors. They are very well made with a quality zipper & soft cotton fabric. I have new standard alternative down pillows inside of them that I wanted to protect. The pillows were easy to slip inside the protectors. The protectors fil perfectly around the pillows. The protectors do not make noise as one's head moves or one repositions the pillow. I am using them in our loft guest room for our grand-children when they have their bi-weekly sleep-overs. The children said, "Nanna, these are the softest pillows ever!"; aw, too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Loehden Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Of Good Material; Good Zippers
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to long term use since this is a very recent purchase, however the material is good and has a good finish, sewing is good, and so are the zippers. We ordered the king size and they fit the pillows just fine, At this point I have no reason to believe they will not be satisfactory for the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Depree

customer_reviews.title: kind of large
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I own queen size pillows but these covers are actually really big. Because they are big and there is so much extra material they bunch up inside the pillow case. They also have a krinkly sound if that makes sense because of the water resistant material. It's not real loud but it's definitely there. the outside of this cover is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Paige S.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for dust mites rather than bedbugs. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for dust mites rather than bedbugs. Unlike the mattress encasement, the pillows don't come with a velcro strip to cover the end of the zipper once you zip it closed. I get why - you wouldn't want it scratching near the face but I'm not confident about the way the zipper closes. It doesn't seem flush enough when it gets zipped up and I could see it "letting" something in or out. the zipper doesn't seem to nestle up under the end of the fabric and mine had a small gap. I just zipped it extra hard and hoped it would work :)
customer_reviews.author: CDL

customer_reviews.title: Luxury & Function at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My husband started using a terry cloth hand towel over his pillowcase at night to contend with humidity/heat/sweat in Houston! Found these and figured we'd give them a try. They're WAY better than a towel, ahem ... and very soft, comfortable - launder well. I've taken to using one on my pillow as well - and not only so they match! They're just luxurious against your neck!
customer_reviews.author: L. Beggins

customer_reviews.title: The zipper is poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: material was nice and waterproof Cons: the zipper was poorly constructed. Unfortunately I returned the product because the zipper kept coming apart. The fit and size were great but the quality of the zipper was poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: charchic

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: These are not waterproof. I’ve purchased I don’t know how many and we use them for our incontintenent partially paralyzed daughter. Every single one has leaked through on the pillow. I haven’t examined the so called ten year warranty yet but I’ve ordered nearly every brand and so far no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the zipper, not easy to use, does not have a big enough piece to open and close it. When closed on your pillow it creates air inside so pillow does not feel the same. Only washed once and dont eat or drink in bed so no spills. Not happy with it as cant use because of the air it creates inside.
customer_reviews.author: vegan

customer_reviews.title: no bed bugs could get on the pillows.
customer_reviews.text: So bed bugs could not get on the pillow material. I ask you. If I buy cotton terry cloth sheets, can the bed bugs get on or climb on the sheets. I am assuming the pillow material is a cotton terry cloth. Can I buy sheets that will fit a twin bed like the pillow. I already have the mattress and box springs cover on the bed. do you have just twin sheet out of the same matterial? I can put them on even tho' I am disabled. F. Glass
customer_reviews.author: F. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps hot
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our young kiddos who slobber/sweat on their pillows and to always mitigate the damage for those middle-of-the-night pukes. The biggest downside is how hot they are; our sun is a furnace when sleeping and they make his head so hot.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O.

customer_reviews.title: Dust mite resistant pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: They fit the pillows well but washing and drying them is a pain - they are washed on delicate but have to be air dryed in the dryer and it takes a long time. It is very time consuming - I would recommend them except for that problem
customer_reviews.author: holliday074

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow protectors
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these pillow protectors. Only gave them 4 out of 5 stars because I don't like the zipper. I have purchased this item before and will continue to purchase it. It's a great product for the money. Zipper is really small and hard to grasp. Also seems like it will not last that long because it tends to pull back too far and hard to start back in right track.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Work as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the queen size cuz I was pretty sure my pillows were bigger than standard....they fit, but are slightly large. I have to be honest - I bought covers like this (and for my mattress) to appease my allergist and am not crazy about having to use them at all...but this brand got great reviews, and I am as happy as anyone else. They're relatively soft - easy to wash, easy to put on.....what more do you want?? I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn K. Morander

customer_reviews.title: Super fine zipper with Invisi-Zip is extremely difficult to operate
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the "Super fine zipper with Invisi-Zip" zipper is important for bed bug protection but that's not what I bought these protectors for. It is almost impossible to grip, guide and pull this zipper with calloused, winter dry fingers. Not sure of the value of the terry cloth covering but it does add to the zipper operation problem and makes it difficult to slide the pillow into the pillow case. I have not had them long enough to comment on their protection, durability or ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't let air escape
customer_reviews.text: So these probably are great at holding back allergens, but the inside of the case is coated in like a PVC plastic so it takes forever for air to escape from it when you lie down on it. For about 5 minutes, it just feels like a bag filled with air.
customer_reviews.author: Zach P.

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Early to Say
customer_reviews.text: Why the seller would contact me after two weeks is beyond me except that it suggests a twisted desparation, or fanatical zeal, in the marketing department. I got these protectors, as well as the queens size mattress cover, precisely because I did have a bedbug infestation at the last apartment I was in and lost not only the bed, all pillows, but 1/2 of all of my belongings. It is too early to say anything about this product except that the ease of putting them on or over their designated targets is unsurpassed...
customer_reviews.author: Bindlestiff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pillow protection
customer_reviews.text: Very good pillow protectors! Waterproof, but no feel or rustling sound of plastic. Easy to put on and washed beautifully. I am very satisfied and even ordered for more pillows! The only con is that when you lay down on them they retain air causing the pillow to be slow to respond. Since I ordered them to protect the pillows and not as an allergy aid, I remedied that by opening the zipper just a tad to allow the air to more quickly escape when you lay on the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: FishLikeAGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best protection all around
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic protection against bugs, dust, and spills. Is NOT crinkly at all, and doesn’t change the feel of the pillow. If anything, it traps a bit of air in and can make it puffy, or flatten, so recommend leaving zipper open putting it into a pillowcase, then let it fluff up and zipper close. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Never sleep in a pillow without these protectors!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow protectors provide a much-needed solution to protect our new Aireloom pillows. We would like these pillows to last forever. The material used in the pillow protectors will definitely help with this. When I ordered, I was a little concerned that the covers would be a snug fit because of the loft of the pillows and the fact that the pillows came with their own plush covers, but they fit the pillows perfectly and, once the pillow cases are on, they are virtually undetectable. I sleep better knowing that our beautiful pillows and their equally gorgeous covers will remain clean, free of moisture intrusion, dust, and mites.
customer_reviews.author: Rhian Stuart

customer_reviews.title: No more sliding memory foam topper!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I bought 2 of them after measuring depth of mattress. I was able to put it on myself without too much issue. So I don't have any bugs but been thinking "what if" at back of my mind for a while and decided to go n just buy it. The main reason was because we have memory foam mattress toppers that would shift around. With this I was able to encase the foam inside along w mattress and problem solved! And I could sleep assured no buggies would go into my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: but it feels like putting your face on a paper towel
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes but felt a little too plastic for my tastes. Also not as soft as I'd prefer. I didn't wash it so not sure if it would feel softer later. Definitely not for direct use on the skin. I guess you could, but it feels like putting your face on a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Designer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow protectors
customer_reviews.text: I like these pillow protecters very much. I wash them all the time and they still work. The only reason I docked a star is because they retain heat pretty bad. They make me sweat. I have never had pillow protectors before, maybe they all retain heat. IDK
customer_reviews.author: Ket4ce

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Safe and Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pillow cases! I feel so comfirtavke sleeping now and i also have a piece of mind knowing that I am safe from dust mites and bed bugs that i have never felt before. Funny I was just thinking of finding a travel pillow case size cover for the My Pillow's Travel Pillow. I take that with me whenever I travel on airplanes, and in the car for long road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Sauchelli

customer_reviews.title: quality item
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item to protect "The my pillows" from staining due to my sweating. They are extremely well made and you can feel the barrier on the inside. Very happy to replace the flimsy ones I had prior.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: actually odorless
customer_reviews.text: They're are a lot of supposedly allergy free covers. We've bought a number of them and returned them because out of the package they have an allergy inducing perfume. Not these! They deliver what they promise. Here's hoping that the material proves to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Curious

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite allergen pillow covers by far
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers have worked really well. They encase the pillow thoroughly which I would think keep out the allergens. The zipper can be a little tricky to get to start going after washing but I think this also really helps it to keep out the allergens. These are my favorite allergen pillow covers by far. I have had these for two months and very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: A good buy1
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I've had them for about 3 months and use them every night. The thing I like best is that they don't make crinkly noises. They are great under a pillowcase, I use jersey and it doesn't cling. While they are not a silky soft baby terry, they are a med. soft, fine grain and under a pillowcase, it doesn't matter. I'll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: sagecoach

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice product. The cover is easy to put on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. The cover is easy to put on and take off. The zipper is slightly recessed and in obtrusive. The terry feels soft even through another pillowslip and the pillow stays cool through the night. Unlike other waterproof pillow covers I've used, this one is completely silent. I don't even know it's there. I would definitely recommend SureGuard pillow covers to anyone. My only caution is be sure that the terry side is on outside when you put the cover into the dryer. If the waterproof lining is outside, the terry will not dry completely.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Dutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Get these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought feather pillows and could still feel the feather sticking out so I tried these and OMG they are more than wonderful! I couldnt feel the feathers at all plus it gave them more shape. I need these covers in regular king size pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: They were always full of air bubbles. Couldn’t sleep with them on pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love that they don't make noises when you move around
customer_reviews.text: I love that they don't make noises when you move around. They have a nice terry-cloth feel to them. The only down-side is that the zipper is a little difficult to zip sometimes. Our first one actually zipped off the tracks and they sent me a replacement. My son had a bloody nose one night and it did a great job of keeping it off our new pillow. Hydrogen peroxide did the trick of getting the blood stain off. They are as good as new. They have been washed multiple times and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: bellabella

customer_reviews.title: Works great, highly recommend getting 2
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream! We have had many accidents and sickness and this protects the pillow/mattress beneath like it never happened. Wash up easy and stand up to the washing machine. Highly recommend having 2 on hand so when one gets dirty you can swap out and put the kiddo back to bed while the other is in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very protective but stuff at first
customer_reviews.text: Definitely protects the pillow because it’s so thick but it can make the pillow seem stiff and full of air. I think with fluffing it and using it over time it will get more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Polly026

customer_reviews.title: Better than the more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly on my pillows, not too snug or too loose. Never had problems with bedbugs, but purchased this just to be safe. I’ve washed them several times and it still looks brand new, plus you can’t beat 2 for the price of one deal. I’ll be purchasing more in the near future!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: They do protect your nice pillows from everything
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these pillow protectors. They fit well and they seem to be able to do what I want them to do, protect my pillows from all stains. I may be buying the mattress protector next since these pillow protectors are what I’ve been looking for for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Just As Represented and Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My main purpose for purchasing this product was to protect my expensive pillows from head and neck sweat. The waterproof portion of the product is covered with a high quality terry type cloth (with a concealed zipper...nice touch) rendering it noiseless. Some waterproof coverings are like sleeping on a plastic bag, rustling every time you move your head. Because it is 100% waterproof, it has a tendency to trap air inside when fully zippered. I'm not worried about bed bugs and such so to alleviate this minor issue, I just leave the zipper partially undone so the air can escape easily. You can't have t both ways. It is perfect for what I wanted. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: I love them!'
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have a foam pillow and was continually getting migraines. I think the dust mites made a home in my pillow! I bought these and no more migraines! They are easy to wash and dry. They fit perfectly on my king sized pillows! I love them!! I'd definitely recommend them to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Interested.....

customer_reviews.title: I can not stand the feel of it. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I can not stand the feel of it. I bought covers, for my covers. figure these would protect my pillow, and let another pillow case help for the feel.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These cases are really great! They have been amazing for our toddler but they are so soft and effective that I’m going to order them for every bed in the house. The terry version is a snug fit. It is great if you have pillow cases that are a little big. The terry grips a bit and will hold the case in place. If you have a snug pillow case I would order the smooth version as it will fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS AT SEAMS AND CORNERS
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases leak at the corners, seams, and at the terminus of the zipper. They ARE nice and soft, but liquids penetrate at the zipper terminus, at the corners, and along the end seam. I do not recommend these cases.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: It’s like laying on a balloon
customer_reviews.text: The air doesn’t come out when you lay down on it. It’s like laying on a balloon.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to buy
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would have some noise to them when sleeping but they don't. They fit the pillows well. I like that they protect the pillows better than the typical fabric protectors since I sometimes have night sweats and hubby drools. The only problem I have with them but not a deal breaker is that when washing,the water doesn't spin out of them, therefore it takes a little longer to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha H

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy at all
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Noisy crinkles with any movement. Has a slight plastic odor even after washing and makes you feel overheated. Not a pleasant sleep experience. Had to get up and remove it!
customer_reviews.author: smnr

customer_reviews.title: These are very good quality and I discovered immediately that they are
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! These are very good quality and I discovered immediately that they are, in fact waterproof! Someone whose name won't be mentioned just had to pee on one of them only minutes after I put it on my body pillow! But the pillow stayed completely dry and this item washes very well. These pillow protectors are not stiff nor do they crinkle and the price is reasonable, definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Katerina1059

customer_reviews.title: good protection for investment in good pillows
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who uses public transportation should have these protectors for their bedding if only to avoid replacement or very inconvenient pest control. After 2 months and two washings they are still protective.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Welter

customer_reviews.title: it's like a giant balloon
customer_reviews.text: these pillow cases are AIR TIGHT when zipped up. it's annoying. I have to leave it unzipped at least halfway or it's like a giant balloon and you literally can't sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy first!

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase, sturdy. Does not feel like you are sleeping on a plastic bag. I purchased this to help protect myself from the sharp down feather stalks, it has been a perfect addition. Sometimes it does hold air, but since I am not using this to protect from allergens this is easily remedied by keeping the zipper open slightly. My wife has noted improvement in her allergies with the use of this.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for High End Vacation Rental Property Pillows!!
customer_reviews.text: Havent cleaned these yet, but have installed these on high end rental property Euro pillows for shams. Seem to be very good quality & very little "plastic-y" feel. Fast delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you wish to keep your pillows dry, these cases are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: If you wish to keep your pillows dry, these cases are perfect. The outer shell is not plastic, so that part might get wet but it will not penetrate through to the pillow, as the inner shell is water-resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Kenrick Chien

customer_reviews.title: We love these covers!
customer_reviews.text: We have a wedding venue with some glamping cabins so protecting our pillows is important but so is the comfort of our customers. These are fabulous on both counts. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Like a plastic bag
customer_reviews.text: I have a custom made full down pillow that I just bought. I bought this pillow cover to protect it but once zipped up, it doesn't allow air to escape well at all so the pillow won't reshape and is like laying on a balloon. I have other pillow covers that don't do this at all so I guess I need to figure out what brand they are.
customer_reviews.author: nathan williams

customer_reviews.title: Super-great product, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this for his pillow! It's comfortable and easy to wash. He's very picky about his pillow, so if he loves it, there's a good chance others will, too.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle Woman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable terry cover, doesn't make a crinkling sound
customer_reviews.text: A standard pillow fits snugly in here. If you cover your fluffy soft pillow, it will become firm inside this zipped pillow protector. Not necessarily a bad thing. We are going to keep the zipper open to allow more "give" while still offering protection from spills and hair products. Love!
customer_reviews.author: mdc

customer_reviews.title: Quality acquisition
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Haven’t washed yet. Material is a very soft cotton. I like to recline on it because of the softness. It’s easy to put the pillows on and the look is square totally. I made a very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Natalia E.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't block smells as much as I had hoped...
customer_reviews.text: Pillow case is okay, moderately comfortable. I bought it specifically because I have a very sweaty head at night, and after a few nights, my pillow absolutely reeks. Instead of buying a new pillow every few weeks, I bought a waterproof pillow case, but after a couple of weeks of use, the pillow underneath still has the smell from my head sweat that I was trying to prevent, albeit less of a smell, but it smells all the same. Does it work? Yes, but not 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Coffill

customer_reviews.title: SureGuard is SureGood.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these. The material is perfect (no noise), it fits my pillows great. Feel this is a good brand so far. Haven't had to wash yet, and haven't spilled anything, but for bed bugs and allergies I am hoping they are helping. Worth the protection purchase and they do have a warranty of 10 years. Highly recommend this brand/product if you are in the market for this sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: GreenApple

customer_reviews.title: My bed bug problem seems to be under control.
customer_reviews.text: My pillows all have these pillow protectors on them...I bought two more sets. I even use one for travel for clean clothes and one for dirty clothes. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Great Gram

customer_reviews.title: A bit warm
customer_reviews.text: These definitely do their job for protecting the pillow, but I get very warm when I sleep and I believe this cover is attributing to making me warmer. I wake up sweating and my shirt damp. I'll note that I placed this over a bamboo king-sized pillow and that could also be making me very warm. I recently removed the cover and it seems to be better for me. Nothing against the product--it's quality and does it's job. Just maybe not for us warm sleepers.
customer_reviews.author: Jer L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pillow Protectors!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. It’s easy to put on and take off. Washes up nicely. It will definitely protect your pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Vivelevin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work good
customer_reviews.text: Wife purchased for her allergy problem and so far it has seemed to help her. Only had for a short time so far but she says she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: 5cents family

product_meta.title: Set of 2 Standard Size SureGuard Pillow Protectors - 100% Waterproof, Bed Bug Proof, Hypoallergenic - Premium Zippered Cotton Terry Covers - 10 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof - Total protection against perspiration, saliva, liquids and stains; 10-year quality guarantee
Bed Bug Proof - Super fine zipper with Invisi-Zip technology completely seals off your pillow from bed bugs - Best used with SureGuard Mattress and Box Spring Encasements.
Hypoallergenic - Perfect for down feather pillows - Blocks dust mites, allergens, bacteria, mildew and mold - Use together with a SureGuard Mattress Protector
Soft & Noiseless - 100% cotton terry surface; Wicks away moisture; Retains the feel of your pillow - Free from Vinyl, PVC, Phthalates, fire retardants and other toxic chemicals
Standard Size (21 in x 27 in) Zippered Pillow Case Covers - Set of 2 - Machine wash & dry. Independently lab tested and GREENGUARD Gold certified.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,005 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: SureGuard warrants to the owner of each its products that if the laminate, fabric or zipper becomes damaged within a period of 10 years from the date of purchase as a result of normal household use, SureGuard will replace the protector provided the care instructions have been followed. The warranty covers the protector product only. Purchase receipt must be retained and presented to validate the warranty. For commercial purchases
